resModule.findResModulePage: SELECT torm.*, tosm.name AS systemModuleName, tou1.username AS create_user_name, tou2.username AS update_user_name FROM t_oauth_resource_module torm, t_oauth_user tou1, t_oauth_user tou2, t_oauth_system_module tosm WHERE torm.CREATE_USER = tou1.id AND torm.update_user = tou2.id AND tosm.system_code = torm.system_code
resModule.findEnabledResModulesBySystemModuleCode: SELECT * FROM t_oauth_resource_module WHERE enabled = 1 AND system_code = ?
